text:
April 29, 1957
Dr. Burton Paulu
Station KUOM
University of Minnesota
Minneapolis 14, Minnesota
Dear Burton:
I shall be present for the Board meetings. I shall
probably arrive May 6 via train, at 7:08 p.m.
I suggest that no great purpose would be se^edby
having a Foundations Committee report at the luncheon. I
have no serious objections if you feel otherwise, but there
is little that can be said, and all this takes time.
A brief report on the JOURNAL and on individual mem-
berships might be appropriate for the Thursday luncheon. As
JSTtaSS Schooley aSd Skomia will not be there - enroute to
Battle Creek.
For the Board agenda, I suggest:
_ FCC call for written arguments on scraping of Sixth
Report and Order as relates to allocations (exempting educaÂ¬
tional TV even so).
__ Report of Publications Committee, and JOURNAL
(via Schooley and/or for Stasheff).
_ Report on Individual Membership drive.
b. Other memberships.
_ Foundation's Copnittee report, and consideration
of some items.
Via return air mail.
Regards,
Prank S. Schooley
FES:nb
CC: Skomia
